experience.description: Worked with the project Kryptodian to develop a platform related to digital asset custody, trading, financial operations. and supervision to be smooth and secure.
Collaborated with Chulalongkorn University to develop Tamsang-Tamsong. On-Demand Delivery Platform to Foster Social Solidarity Economy in Thailand.
Internship, frontend developer role, Wizglee project involvement, responsibilities for marketplace and admin dashboard in the development of a digital access trading platform.
In the company, assumed responsibilities as an IT support specialist overseeing the Learning Management System (LMS) for the Careervio product.
